Text.dialogue: Magnets are objects that are surrounded by a <color=#ff8933>magnetic field</color>,being able to <color=#92e8c0>magnetize certain materials</color>,such as iron and steel and repel and attract other magnets
That attraction and repulsion between two magnets is called Magnetic Force, which doesn't require contact to be applied
All the magnetized objects have a SOUTH and a NORTH pole, when you approach 2 magnets by the same pole,they repel. They attract each other when the poles are opposite!
I have a magnet tool with me! You can press Z to turn it on and off and X to change poles
You can also hold down the ↑ and ↓ keys to rotate the pole by 90º degrees! The above my head will mark the direction
Be aware: Everytime the tool is activated or has its polarity changed, you use 1 energy. Manage it safely and let's get past this maze
